source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_00<tab>Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna would ask a favor of you.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・トランキルのラヤ・オ・センナは冒険者に頼みがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_01<tab>A<var 1F /var>Ruhn<var 1F /var>Senna, unconvinced by his sister's words, has run off to the Bramble Patch on his own to prove that your powers are not needed. Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna, fearing for her brother's safety, asks you to go look for him.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_01<tab>ラヤ・オ・センナから依頼を受けた。東部森林の茨の森にいる「ア・ルン・センナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_02<tab>Despite suffering injury in his foolhardy quest to placate the forest single-handedly, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn<var 1F /var>Senna remains as stubborn as ever. Placate the tree in his stead.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_02<tab>ア・ルン・センナと話した。東部森林の茨の森にある樹の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8DDA01 /var>」と交感しよう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_03<tab>By communing with an elemental before A<var 1F /var>Ruhn<var 1F /var>Senna's eyes, you have grudgingly won the trust of the proud young Padjal. Return to Camp Tranquil and speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_03<tab>茨の森にある樹を鎮めた。南部森林のキャンプ・トランキルにいる「ラヤ・オ・センナ」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_04RayaOSenna informs you that her brother, despite his misgivings, has finally come to accept your participation in the Quieting. To commune with the great one, however, no ordinary powers will suffice. Continue to hone your skills, that you might join the two Seedseers in healing the forest.

※The next white mage quest will be available from RayaOSenna upon reaching level 45.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_SEQ_04ラヤ・オ・センナに報告した。ラヤ・オ・センナは、ア・ルン・センナが納得したことで、いよいよ大精霊を鎮める儀式の準備に入ると語った。儀式の準備に備えて、修行を怠らないようにしよう。

※白魔道士のレベルが45以上になると、ラヤ・オ・センナから次の白魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_TODO_00<tab>Speak with A<var 1F /var>Ruhn<var 1F /var>Senna in the Bramble Patch.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_TODO_00<tab>茨の森のア・ルン・センナと話す
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_TODO_01<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8DDA01 /var>を鎮める

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna at Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_TODO_02<tab>キャンプ・トランキルのラヤ・オ・センナと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... I owe you an apology.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_000)) (( )) 02 /var>、頼みたいことがあるのよ。
ア・ルンについての話なんだけど、いいかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_001<tab>When last we spoke, I promised that I would find a way to convince my brother to accept you, but I fear he intently refuses to heed my words.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_001ア・ルンが「角尊」じゃないあんたのことを、
頑固に受け入れていないことは知ってるでしょう？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_002<tab>Why, the more I try to reason with him, the more he shuts his ears to me. All pride and no common sense, that one─I can scarce believe we are kin!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_002もう、あたしが何を言っても聞かないのよね。
余計に話がこじれちゃうだけで……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_003<tab>So intent is he to prove that you are unneeded that he dashed out into the forest all alone, boasting that he would placate every last elemental and save the forest all by himself!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_003それであの子、あんたが要らないことを実証しようとして、
ひとりであちこち出向いて、精霊を鎮めて回ってるの。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_004<tab>Needless to say, such a task is far beyond his powers. There is a part of me that would like nothing more than to see the foolish boy learn his lesson, and yet...as his sister, I fear for him.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_004精霊を鎮めるのは簡単なことじゃないのに……。
あんな無茶を続けてたら、いつか倒れちゃうわ。
心配よ……あの子は、周りが見えないところがあるし。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_005<tab>Would you go look after him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Seedseer or no, he is in many ways still a child, and the forest grows ever more unsafe these days.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_005……お願い、)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ア・ルンのことを、助けてあげてくれない？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_006<tab>I thought to go myself, but...if <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> were to save my brother from his own recklessness, perhaps he might finally see how fatuous he has been.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_006それに、あの子のことを助ければ、
ア・ルンもあんたのことを認めるようになるかも。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_007<tab>When last I spoke with him, he announced his intentions to begin his efforts in the Bramble Patch─with any luck, you may still find him there. Now please go in haste, before some ill fate befalls him...
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_007今、ア・ルンは「茨の森」に行ってるはずよ。
あの子に何かあったら、カヌ・エ姉さまに顔向けできない。
頼むわね、)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_010<tab>Hmph! If it isn't my sister's favorite adventurer. Come to show me up, have you?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_010き、君は……)) (( )) 02 /var>！
ラヤ・オ姉さまが、よこしたんだね？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_011<tab>Well, you can march right back and tell Sister that I am doing just fine. I am only...ungh...<var 1A 02 /var>resting<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_011はは……なんかみっともないところ、見られちゃったな。
せめてあと1本……精霊の古木を癒そうと思ったのに、
疲れ果てて、一歩も歩けなくなっちゃったよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_012<tab><cough> Even if I <var 1A 02 /var>were<var 1A 01 /var> hurt and unable to placate this tree...what could a run<var 1F /var>of<var 1F /var>the<var 1F /var>mill adventurer like you do about it?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_012もう、癒すべき樹は目の前だっていうのに……
足がいうことを聞かないなんて……！
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_020<tab>……ちゃんと、精霊を鎮めたんだね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_021<tab>If you think healing a sapling or two is going to convince me that <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are a worthy inheritor to the teachings of Master A<var 1F /var>Towa...
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_021一応……手伝ってくれてありがとう、と言っておくよ。
でも、僕はやっぱり……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_022<tab>A<var 1F /var>Ruhn, you <var 1A 02 /var>yourself<var 1A 01 /var> do not believe those words!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_022<tab>ア・ルン、本当はわかっているんでしょう？

TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_023ラヤ・オ姉さまっ！？
どうして、ここに！？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_024<tab>Seeing to my pigheaded brother's safety─what do you <var 1A 02 /var>think<var 1A 01 /var> I am doing? For better or worse, it would appear you suffer only from bruises to your leg and your pride.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_024あんたたちが心配で、追いかけてきたのよ。
どうせ、素直になれないだろうと思ってたし。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_025<tab>A<var 1F /var>Ruhn. For all your obstinacy, I know that deep down you are no fool.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_025<tab>ア・ルン……大事なことを見失ってない？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_026<tab>No, you are wise beyond your years. You realize as well as I the dire fate that will befall Gridania if we do not quell the great one's fury and restore peace to the wood.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_026いい、大切なのは大精霊を鎮めることよ？
黒衣森を元通りに、平和で静かな森に戻すことよ？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_027<tab>The adventurer is not Padjali─this is true. But what of it? Would you blindly trumpet tradition as the very forest turns against us and brings ruin to our home? We have a greater calling to answer─you know this!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_027だったら角尊だ何だなんてのは、小さいことじゃない。
こだわってたら、肝心なときに失敗しちゃうわ。
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ARUHNSENNA_000_028<tab>う、うん……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_029<tab>Oh, my dear A<var 1F /var>Ruhn... What are sisters for, if not to forgive their little brothers' fits of folly?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_029ふぅ、ようやく納得してくれたみたいね。
あたしたちがやるべきは、大精霊を鎮めること。
そのために……3人で儀式をやる、そういうことよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_030<tab>Now, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I believe the most important task of all still awaits us. Let us return to Camp Tranquil.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_030じゃ、「キャンプ・トランキル」に戻るわよ。
ここはもう大丈夫、心配いらないわ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, thank you. I knew it was only a matter of time before A<var 1F /var>Ruhn came around to reason. And yet, his hesitance to accept you was not entirely unfounded.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_040ア・ルンが頑なだったのにも、理由はあるのよ。
それは……白魔法が「森を守るための力」であると同時に、
「森を滅ぼせる禁忌の力」でもあるからなの。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_041<tab>When we first met, I promised that one day I would share with you the tale of how white magic came to be regarded as a forbidden art. Well, I suppose this is as good a day as any for the telling.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_041……今から3000年ほど昔、「第五星暦」のころの話よ。
当時は、恐ろしい「第五霊災」の寒波の名残で、
今と比べ物にならないくらい、世界は冷えきっていた。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_042<tab>The tale begins some three millennia ago, in the Fifth Astral Era. It was the time of the Endless Frost, when a barren wasteland of snow and rime stretched as far as the eye could see.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_042それを乗り越えるために、人々は「魔法」を手にした……
「第五星暦」っていうのはね、そんな時代だったの。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_043<tab>Food was scarce, and warmth scarcer. The histories hold many a grim tale of those who died in their beds, starving and benumbed. So did our ancestors discover magic, born out of the most fundamental instinct─survival.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_043人々は寒さをしのぐため、異種族との戦いのため、
そして何より富と繁栄のために、より強い魔法を求めた。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_044<tab>In time, the winter thawed, and magic was no longer essential for survival. But once awakened to its conveniences, there was no returning to how things once were. Ere long, the people discovered all the myriad ways in which magic could be employed, and civilization flourished.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_044それが破壊をもたらす禁呪、「黒魔法」よ。
そして時を同じくして、黒魔法への抑止力ともなり、
癒しと浄化に用いるべく編み出された魔法があった。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_045<tab>But prosperity breeds contempt, and nations warred for power and riches. So did the people seek greater and greater power, to rain destruction down upon their enemies. So was born black magic, the most devastating form of sorcery the world had seen.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_045わかるでしょう、それが「白魔法」ね。
人々はふたつの強大な魔法の力を手に入れ、
その文明は栄華を極めた。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_046<tab>At the same time, another form of magic emerged, brought forth by those who would keep this immense destructive power in check. That is white magic─our magic. Does this surprise you? Just as there can be no dawn without the night, the white and black are but two sides of the same coin.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_046でも、時が経つにつれて……白魔道士たちですら、
さらなる繁栄のために白魔法を濫用し、森を汚しはじめた。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_047<tab>War raged on, and magic was used and abused with little concern for the consequences. And consequences there were─unchecked use of magic soon dried the flow of aether, threatening to bring blight to the land.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_047強大な魔法は、膨大なエーテルを消費するわ。
濫用すれば、エーテルが枯れ果て、土地は荒廃する。
それは白魔法の行使でも、例外じゃないの。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_048<tab>The magic of healing? It made little difference. If used with no concern for the aether, our magic could prove as ruinous to the land as the most devastating black magic spell. And so it was that the practicing of white magic was forbidden...with one exception.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_048だから、エーテルを枯渇させる一因である白魔法は、
癒しの力でありながら、禁忌とされたってわけ。
……でも、たったひとつだけ例外があった。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_049<tab>...The Padjal. Our kind were entrusted as sole shepherds of the now-forbidden art, to serve as healers and bringers of peace while ensuring that this great power would never again be misused.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_049それが……あたしたち角尊なのよ。
ア・ルンはね、白魔法を伝承してきた存在の末裔として、
角尊であることに、責任と誇りを感じているのよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_050<tab>Though he is still young, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn feels this profound sense of responsibility as strongly as any of us, thus his hesitance to accept you. But having seen your abilities─and the sincerity of your intentions─you can rest assured his doubts have been dispelled.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_050でも、ア・ルンもあんたの実力を見たら、
なんとか納得してくれたようだし……
これで本格的に、「鎮撫の儀」の準備ができるわね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_051<tab>With the three of us united in place and purpose, and your skills ever growing, the day that we may perform the Quieting draws near. To our fortune, the great one has not yet been entirely consumed by fury, but our time remains short.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_051「長老の木」に宿る大精霊が、
まだ完全に怒りに呑まれていないとはいえ、
儀式は早いに越したことはないわ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_052<tab>To commune with the great one, and restore the Twelveswood to its former state of harmony, we must truly be one of heart, one of mind.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_052元の静謐（せいひつ）な黒衣森を取り戻すためにも、
あたしたち全員が協力し合うことが大事よ、いいわね？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_053<tab>It is to this end that A<var 1F /var>Towa<var 1F /var>Cant has guided you to us. Further your mastery of our art, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and let us mend the wounds of the wood together.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_RAYAOSENNA_000_053あんたが受け継いだ「ソウルクリスタル」の持ち主、
ア・トワ・カント様も、そう望んでいるに違いないわ。
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_POP_MESSAGE<tab>敵の気配を感じた！！
TEXT_JOBWHM400_01081_ACCESS_MESSAGE<tab>その行動は出現した敵を倒さないと実行できません
